sentences.english: He ran up a thatched hut for his children.
sentences.chinese: 他給孩子們匆匆蓋起一間草屋。

sentences.english: He is a green young man.
sentences.chinese: 他是個初出茅草屋的年輕人。

sentences.english: The house is called a sod house or soddy .
sentences.chinese: 那麼房子就叫做草皮屋或草屋。

sentences.english: But when I left for other side of the island, I was traveling on unpaved roads line with leaky cottages.
sentences.chinese: 但是當我到該島另一邊，走在破草屋邊上未鋪的路上。
修理茅草屋屋頂的三個男人。

sentences.english: The thatched cottage was submerged by drift sand.
sentences.chinese: 這個茅草屋被流沙淹沒了。

sentences.english: The natives of that region still live in primitive straw huts.
sentences.chinese: 那個地區的居民依然住在簡陋的茅草屋裏。

sentences.english: Liu Hong had installed himself in one of the farmers' huts.
sentences.chinese: 劉洪自己住在一個農戶的茅草屋裏面。

sentences.english: "I will build a house of hay, " he says.
The roof of the granny's hut came down during the night.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘草屋的屋頂在夜間塌下來了。

sentences.english: Wife of the fetch after two years, careless between Shanshangyi house settles down, husband and wife is harmonious.
sentences.chinese: 兩年後接來妻子，在山上一間草屋安家，夫妻和睦。

sentences.english: Experience the plush comfort and enjoy exotic splendor of these thatched cottages .
sentences.chinese: 體驗豪華舒適和享受異國情調的輝煌，這些茅草屋。

sentences.english: The people of the village live in neat huts with grass roofs.
sentences.chinese: 村民們住在整潔的茅草屋中。

sentences.english: My aunt lives in a pretty thatched cottage in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我嬸嬸住在鄉下的一間茅草屋裏。

sentences.english: Out of the wigwam crawled the boy who'd shot the arrow.
sentences.chinese: 茅草屋外，一個在匍匐而行的小男孩在射箭。

sentences.english: Their thatched -roofed hut, sparse is being silent in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 他們的草屋，稀稀疏疏的在雨裏靜默着。
